title: Traxxas 7250 1/16 Summit VXL Inner Driveshaft Assembly
description: Driveshaft assembly, inner (1) (fits front & rear, differential side) Use Traxxas stock and hop-up replacement parts to get the most out of your Traxxas RTR vehicles. This product is made from high quality materials and designed for long-lasting performance. This is replacement hardware for use on Traxxas vehicles; consult your user's manual for exact parts listings.
This is an Inner Driveshaft for the 1/16 Summit. This drive shaft is even stronger than the stock Revo drive shaft.
